qas.question: What curriculum does the island adapt?

answers.text: GCSE, A/S and A2, to Level 3 Diplomas and VRQ qualifications

context: <a0_0>The UK national curriculum<a0_0/> is adapted for local use. A range of qualifications are offered – from <a1_0>GCSE, A/S and A2, to Level 3 Diplomas and VRQ qualifications<a1_0/>:
